title: Experience-Based Reflective Learning Simulation Program for Multicultural Understanding

context.prior_knowledge: Basic foreign language communication skills and general understanding of other cultures
context.additional_context: Multicultural situation experience and reflective learning using smartphone-based VR simulations in a restricted technological environment.

learning_goals: Learners can experience three or more multicultural conflict scenarios through VR simulation and write reflective journals afterward.
Learners can analyze communication strategies from the perspective of members of other cultures and propose improvements.
Learners can improve their awareness of cultural bias by 20% or more through pre- and post-self-assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
